00019 #include "CircleMobility.h"
00020 
00021 #include <FWMath.h>
00022 
00023 
00024 Define_Module(CircleMobility);
00025 
00026 
00027 void CircleMobility::initialize(int stage)
00028 {
00029     BaseMobility::initialize(stage);
00030 
00031     debugEV << "initializing CircleMobility stage " << stage << endl;
00032 
00033     if (stage == 0) {
00034         // read parameters
00035         center.x = (par("cx"));
00036         center.y = (par("cy"));
00037         if(!world->use2D()) {
00038           center.z = (par("cz"));
00039         }
00040         r = par("r");
00041         ASSERT(r>0);
00042         angle = par("startAngle").doubleValue()/180.0*PI;
00043         move.setSpeed(par("speed").doubleValue());
00044         omega = move.getSpeed()/r;
00045 
00046         // calculate initial position
00047         if(!world->use2D()) {
00048           move.setStart( Coord(center.x + r * cos(angle), center.y + r * sin(angle), center.z) );
00049         }
00050         else {
00051           move.setStart( Coord(center.x + r * cos(angle), center.y + r * sin(angle)) );
00052         }
00053 
00054         targetPos = move.getStartPos();
00055     }
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 void CircleMobility::makeMove()
00060 {
00061     move.setStart(targetPos, simTime());
00062 
00063     angle += omega * SIMTIME_DBL(updateInterval);
00064     targetPos.x = (center.x + r * cos(angle));
00065     targetPos.y = (center.y + r * sin(angle));
00066 
00067     move.setDirectionByTarget(targetPos);
00068 
00069     fixIfHostGetsOutside();
00070 }
00071 
00072 void CircleMobility::fixIfHostGetsOutside()
00073 {
00074     Coord dummy = Coord::ZERO;
00075     double dum;
00076 
00077     handleIfOutside( WRAP, targetPos, center, dummy, dum);
00078 }
